gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bulls 118, Grizzlies 110
gameRecap.excerpt: The Bulls defeated the Grizzlies, 118-110. DeMar DeRozan recorded 30 points and eight rebounds for the Bulls, while Andre Drummond (21 points, 13 rebounds) and Nikola Vucevic (20 points, 10 rebounds, five assists) added a combined 41 points and 23 rebounds in the victory. GG Jackson tallied a career-high 27 points (4-9 3pt. FG) for the Grizzlies in the losing effort. The Bulls improve to 25-27 on the season, while the Grizzlies fall to 18-34.
